dcterms:creator: G. Araniti
A. Iera
S. Pizzi
F. Rinaldi
dcterms:description: This dataset discusses the advancements and challenges in integrating non-terrestrial networks into 6G systems, focusing on radio access technologies.
dcterms:title: 6G non-terrestrial networks

dcterms:creator: M. Hosseinian
J. P. Choi
S.-H. Chang
J. Lee
dcterms:description: This dataset reviews the development of standards for 5G non-terrestrial networks and the technical challenges associated with integrating satellite technology into the 5G network.
dcterms:title: 5G NTN standards development

dcterms:creator: P. Angeletti
R. De Gaudenzi
dcterms:description: This dataset presents heuristic methods for managing radio resources in massive MIMO satellite broadband communication networks.
dcterms:title: Heuristic radio resource management

dcterms:creator: A. Jayaprakash
H. Chen
P. Xiao
B. G. Evans
Y. Zhang
J. Y. Li
A. B. Awoseyila
dcterms:description: This dataset analyzes candidate waveforms for integrated satellite-terrestrial 5G systems, focusing on their performance and applicability.
dcterms:title: Candidate waveforms for integrated satellite-terrestrial 5G systems

dcterms:creator: M. Sarajlić
N. Tervo
A. Pärssinen

H. Halbauer
K. Roth

dcterms:description: This dataset provides design guidelines for waveforms intended for sub-THz 6G communications, addressing the unique challenges of this frequency range.
dcterms:title: Waveforms for sub-THz 6G: Design guidelines

dcterms:creator: 3GPP
dcterms:description: This technical report discusses RF and coexistence aspects related to non-terrestrial networks, providing guidelines for their integration.
dcterms:title: Non-terrestrial networks (NTN) related RF and coexistence aspects

dcterms:creator: 3GPP
dcterms:description: This technical specification outlines the radio transmission and reception requirements for base stations in the NR framework.
dcterms:title: NR; base station (BS) radio transmission and reception

dcterms:creator: 3GPP
dcterms:description: This technical specification details the radio transmission and reception requirements for user equipment in the NR framework, specifically for Range 2 standalone.
dcterms:title: NR; user equipment (UE) radio transmission and reception; part 2: Range 2 standalone

dcterms:creator: 3GPP
dcterms:description: This technical specification outlines the radio transmission and reception requirements for user equipment in the NR framework, specifically for Range 1 standalone.
dcterms:title: NR; user equipment (UE) radio transmission and reception; part 1: Range 1 standalone

dcterms:creator: 3GPP
dcterms:description: This technical report studies the new radio (NR) requirements to support non-terrestrial networks, providing insights into their integration.
dcterms:title: Study on new radio (NR) to support non-terrestrial networks

dcterms:creator: 3GPP
dcterms:description: This technical report presents solutions for NR to support non-terrestrial networks, addressing the challenges of integration.
dcterms:title: Solutions for NR to support non-terrestrial networks (NTN)
